articles.title: OpenAI policy exec who opposed chatbot’s “adult mode” reportedly fired on discrimination claim
articles.description: The executive has denied the allegation that she engaged in discrimination.

articles.title: Okay, now exactly half of xAI’s founding team has left the company
articles.description: Whatever the cause of the departures, the cumulative impact is alarming. There is a lot of work left to do at xAI, and an IPO will bring more
